about_the_game:
Descend into ancient alien Tombs

Across the planet of Vestius, aliens tombs have been discovered. These tombs are filled with an ancient threat long since forgotten, as well as artifacts of great power. This has caused many, known as Delvers, to descend their depths in search of riches.

Cosmic is a retro FPS that attempts to take the best elements of first person shooters like Halo and Doom, and mix them into a unique experience. In this game you will explore the tombs of a threat so ancient that only whispers remain of them.

Game Features

  • Classic FPS shooting, without all the modern bloat

  • Guns that each have unique uses, vary your loadout between levels and between fights

  • Explore ancient tombs in order to collect artifacts to give you unique powers and upgrade your arsenal

  • Fight enemies that will challenge you in different ways

  • Comic book esthetic used to give each level their own flare

  • Learn the story of Vestius, its people and the origins of this ancient foe

  • Collect badges to prove your mastery over the game

  • Challenge yourself with a rune system that will give boons to your enemies or banes to you

A handcrafted world

 The world of Cosmic is brought to life by its mixture of 3D space and 2D art.

Every arena will be unique from the last, giving you new challenges to overcome.

If you wish there was a game with the trimmings of shooters from the early 2000s, like Halo, then it's time for you to become a delver and descend into the depths of an alien hellscape.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and gore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit version
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 @3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X @3.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 TI (2GB) or AMD HD 7750 (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Descend into ancient alien tombs to find artifacts from a long lost civilization in the hopes of one day striking it rich. Cosmic is an FPS that takes the best of the 90s and 2000s shooters and puts it into one game.
